content: **this crochet pattern is free to view online on my website here https //hookedonpatterns com/crochet-blog/free-crochet-spiral-coasters** the candy swirl coasters pdf pattern is available to download for a small price it includes high quality step by step photographs throughout you will also receive an image-free printer friendly copy written using us crochet terms with a conversion chart to help with converting into uk terms this is a crochet pattern to make a 2 colour spiral design coaster these coasters can be made in any colour combinations i have chosen bright colours for a candy swirl effect making fun vibrant summertime coasters these coasters only use a small amount of yarn approximately 5g or 9yds of each colour making them a great scrap yarn project they are quick and easy to crochet which makes them perfect as craft stall fillers or last minute gifts i recommend using cotton yarn for greater absorbency i have used lily sugar n cream yarn and a 4 5mm hook my finished coasters measure approximately 9 5cm/3 75 in diameter exact gauge isn t important just try to keep your stitches fairly compact to minimise gaps and maximise absorbency you will need aran/worsted weight cotton yarn in 2 colours - approx 5g/9yds of each colour 4 5mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors
